dict.acceptation: 准许，赞同；同意；（意见等的）一致；

sent.orig: Informed consent right is formed by the informed right and consent right as a whole.
sent.trans: 知情同意权是由“知情权”和“同意权”两部分构成的一个整体。

sent.orig: Forty-four U.S. states have parental notification or consent laws.
sent.trans: 美国的44个州有父母通知法或同意法。

sent.orig: I understand and consent that I will conform to the Enrolment and Candidate Regulations of HKPEAC.
sent.trans: 本人明白并同意遵守香港普通话培训测试中心的报名须知及考生须知。

sent.orig: She was chosen by common consent to speak for the group.
sent.trans: 所有人都同意选她代表小组讲话。

sent.orig: Will your mother consent to the marriage?
sent.trans: 你母亲同意这桩婚姻吗？
